mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM car_msg_info
deviceTime BETWEEN #{departureTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND #{arriveTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
ORDER BY deviceTime ASC

mapper.update:
update car_msg_info
sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deviceTime = #{devicetime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sim = #{sim,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serialNumber = #{serialnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
warn = #{warn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=FLOAT},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=FLOAT},
elevation = #{elevation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
velocity = #{velocity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
direction = #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mileage = #{mileage,jdbcType=FLOAT},
oilMass = #{oilmass,jdbcType=FLOAT},
recorderVelocity = #{recordervelocity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
speed = #{speed,jdbcType=INTEGER},
coolantTemperature = #{coolanttemperature,jdbcType=INTEGER},
manifoldPressure = #{manifoldpressure,jdbcType=INTEGER},
airFlow = #{airflow,jdbcType=FLOAT},
cumulativeKilometers = #{cumulativekilometers,jdbcType=FLOAT},
idleFuelConsumption = #{idlefuelconsumption,jdbcType=FLOAT},
dynamicFuelConsumption = #{dynamicfuelconsumption,jdbcType=FLOAT},
instantFuelConsumption = #{instantfuelconsumption,jdbcType=FLOAT},
fuelConsumption = #{fuelconsumption,jdbcType=FLOAT},
voltage = #{voltage,jdbcType=FLOAT},
addTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update car_msg_info set sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deviceTime = #{devicetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sim = #{sim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serialNumber = #{serialnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, warn = #{warn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=FLOAT}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=FLOAT}, fixLatitude = #{fixLatitude,jdbcType=FLOAT}, fixLongitude = #{fixLongitude,jdbcType=FLOAT}, elevation = #{elevation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, velocity = #{velocity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, direction = #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mileage = #{mileage,jdbcType=FLOAT}, oilMass = #{oilmass,jdbcType=FLOAT}, recorderVelocity = #{recordervelocity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, speed = #{speed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coolantTemperature = #{coolanttemperature,jdbcType=INTEGER}, manifoldPressure = #{manifoldpressure,jdbcType=INTEGER}, airFlow = #{airflow,jdbcType=FLOAT}, cumulativeKilometers = #{cumulativekilometers,jdbcType=FLOAT}, idleFuelConsumption = #{idlefuelconsumption,jdbcType=FLOAT}, dynamicFuelConsumption = #{dynamicfuelconsumption,jdbcType=FLOAT}, instantFuelConsumption = #{instantfuelconsumption,jdbcType=FLOAT}, fuelConsumption = #{fuelconsumption,jdbcType=FLOAT}, voltage = #{voltage,jdbcType=FLOAT}, addTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.* from (SELECT cm.sn,cm.latitude,cm.longitude,cm.state,c.plateNumber FROM sector_info AS s JOIN car_info AS c ON c.sectorInfo=s.id JOIN car_msg_info AS cm ON cm.sn=c.sn WHERE s.id=#{sectorId} ORDER BY cm.addTime desc) as a GROUP BY a.sn

SELECT state,mileage,speed,voltage,coolantTemperature,instantFuelConsumption,fuelConsumption,longitude,latitude,oilMass,recorderVelocity,addTime FROM motorcade.car_msg_info WHERE sn = #{sn} ORDER BY addTime desc LIMIT 0,1

SELECT * FROM car_msg_info WHERE sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and addTime >= #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and addTime <= #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT count(id) FROM car_msg_info WHERE sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and addTime >= #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and addTime <= #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT * FROM car_msg_info WHERE sn=#{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND state in (2,3) ORDER BY id DESC limit #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}
